line.text: Look in thy glass and tell the face thou viewest
line.meter: s s* s s* s s* s s* s s*

line.text: Now is the time that face should form another
line.meter: s s* s s* s s* s s* s s*

line.text: Whose fresh repair if now thou not renewest
line.meter: s s* s s* s s* s s* s s*

line.text: Thou dost beguile the world unbless some mother
line.meter: s s* s s* s s* s s* s s*

line.text: For where is she so fair whose uneared womb
line.meter: s s* s s* s s* s s* s s*

line.text: Disdains the tillage of thy husbandry
line.meter: s s* s s* s s* s s* s s*

line.text: Or who is he so fond will be the tomb
line.meter: s s* s s* s s* s s* s s*

line.text: Of his self-love to stop posterity
line.meter: s s* s s* s s* s s* s s*

line.text: Thou art thy mother glass and she in thee
line.meter: s s* s s* s s* s s* s s*

line.text: Calls back the lovely April of her prime
line.meter: s s* s s* s s* s s* s s*

line.text: So thou through windows of thine age shalt see
line.meter: s s* s s* s s* s s* s s*

line.text: Despite of wrinkles this thy golden time
line.meter: s s* s s* s s* s s* s s*

line.text: But if thou live remembered not to be
line.meter: s s* s s* s s* s s* s s*

line.text: Die single and thine image dies with thee
line.meter: s s* s s* s s* s s* s s*
